2018.question: This is the book. He likes it most. (Choose the most suitable combination of sentences)
2018.prashna: यह वही किताब है। वह इसे सबसे ज्यादा पसंद करता है। (वाक्यों का सबसे उपयुक्त संयोजन चुनें)

options.A: This is the book, so he likes it most.
options.B: This is the book, therefore he likes it most.
options.C: This is the book, because he likes it most.
options.D: This is the book which he likes most.

vikalpa.A: This is the book, so he likes it most.
vikalpa.B: This is the book, therefore he likes it most.
vikalpa.C: This is the book, because he likes it most.
vikalpa.D: This is the book which he likes most.

2018.question: This girl never (see) the Taj Mahal. (Choose the most suitable option)
2018.prashna: इस लड़की ने कभी ताज महल नहीं (देखा) है। (सबसे उपयुक्त विकल्प चुनें)

options.A: This girl has never seen the Taj Mahal.
options.B: This girl is never seen the Taj Mahal.
options.C: This girl not see the Taj Mahal.
options.D: This girl has seen the Taj Mahal never.

vikalpa.A: This girl has never seen the Taj Mahal.
vikalpa.B: This girl is never seen the Taj Mahal.
vikalpa.C: This girl not see the Taj Mahal.
vikalpa.D: This girl has seen the Taj Mahal never.

options.A: She is the girl whose name is Raavi.
options.B: She is the girl whom name is Raavi.
options.C: She is the girl who name is Raavi.
options.D: She is the girl that name is Raavi.

2019.question: The line 'In hearts at peace, under an English heaven' is taken from .................... (Choose the correct option)
Match the names of the poets given in List A with their works in List B.

List B.iii: When the Leaves Are Falling Fast
List B.iv: Sweetest Love I Do Not Goe

2022.prashna: "मेरी पानी की नाद पर मुझसे पहले कोई था, और मैं, दूसरे आने वाले की तरह, प्रतीक्षा कर रहा हूँ।" — यह कहाँ से है?

2024.question: She is very dull. She cannot pass. (Choose the best combination)
2024.prashna: वह बहुत सुस्त है। वह पास नहीं हो सकती। (सबसे अच्छा संयोजन चुनें)

options.A: She is too dull to pass
options.B: To pass is she too dull
options.C: Dull is she too to pass
options.D: Too dull is to pass she

vikalpa.A: वह पास होने के लिए बहुत सुस्त है
vikalpa.B: पास होने के लिए वह बहुत सुस्त है
vikalpa.C: सुस्त है वह भी पास होने के लिए
vikalpa.D: बहुत सुस्त है पास होना उसे

2024.question: Ramesh has been absent ........... Friday. (Choose the correct option)
2024.prashna: रमेश ........... शुक्रवार से अनुपस्थित है। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

options.C: Hardly had he settled into his seat when Radha charged in.

vikalpa.B: उसकी आँखें मुश्किल से बंद थीं।
vikalpa.C: मुश्किल से वह अपनी सीट पर बैठा ही था कि राधा अंदर आ गई।

2024.question: He cannot put ........... with such insult. (Choose the correct option)
2024.prashna: वह इस तरह के अपमान को ........... नहीं कर सकता। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

options.B: I did my work very quick.

vikalpa.B: मैंने अपना काम बहुत जल्दी किया (very quick)।
vikalpa.C: मैंने अपना काम जल्दी से किया (quickly)।
vikalpa.D: मैं अपना काम जल्दी करता हूँ।
